description: Beyond Styx is a RBG with mecanics of turn based strategy made for one or two players who incarn semi-gods escaping from hell. The game takes place in a greek's mythology like period. The hero is going to face ennemies who will do everything to stop him. At the begenning, the player has to choose the god he will play, that will give several abilities upgradable throughout the journey. The player can whether control the squad or team up with a friend controlling the other member of the squad.

team.txt: My name is Darius ENGLER. I am a graduate of a Terminale S specialising in Mathematics and I have been interested in the field of computer science for several years. As I already have some experience in programming I have been appointed group leader. I will therefore take advantage of this project to acquire more skills in this field. I'm not someone who plays video games a lot but it's still a field that I'm in and that I find very interesting.

team.name: Thomas
team.txt: My name is XU Thomas, I have just graduated from terminal S in the SVT sector, having already been involved in IT and finding the subject attractive, but above all out of a desire to give up chemistry, I naturally turned to IT and therefore to EPITA.

team.name: Pierre
team.txt: My name is Pierre Bourrely. As early as my year of second year, I knew that I wanted to go to an engineering school. I discovered my passion for computers and I wanted to learn my field. I joined EPITA in order to deepen my knowledge in this field.

team.name: Aniss
team.txt: My name is Outaleb Aniss, I am a student in the first year of the preparatory cycle at EPITA. When I was younger I was curious to understand how websites were designed, so I started using HTML, CSS and Javascript. I then wanted to understand more about computers in general and other computer languages. It was only natural that after obtaining the scientific baccalaureate with a mathematical speciality that I went to EPITA.
